channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Alphabet shares rise on earnings beats boosted by cloud revenue
item.description: Google parent Alphabet reported third-quarter earnings that beat on top and bottom lines.

item.title: Swiss bank UBS smashes third-quarter expectations with $1.4 billion in profit
item.description: Swiss banking titan UBS on Wednesday posted a large profit beat, after completing its first wave of client migrations following its integration of col...

item.title: Google Looks More to What It Can Control
item.description: Robust earnings growth and signals on cost control could lift some of the fog of regulatory worry.

item.title: Volkswagen profit plunges 42% in third quarter amid sweeping overhaul plans
item.description: German automaker Volkswagen on Wednesday reported a 42% drop in operating profit in the third quarter.

item.title: Alphabet's two pillars of growth stand tall in the latest quarter. But we're not ready to act
item.description: Alphabet shares surged during Tuesday's after-hours trading following a solid earnings print.

item.title: Electric Air Taxis Are Already Coming in for a Hard Landing
item.description: German startup Lilium is the first listed eVTOL maker to be at risk of collapse, but it may not be the last.

item.title: Florida Accidentally Banned Banks From Doing Business in Sunshine State
item.description: The state has temporarily fixed the problem by using emergency powers related to recent hurricanes.

item.title: Sterling Could Rise if U.K. Fiscal Plans Are Credible
item.description: The pound was weaker, and is likely to rise if the U.K. budget’s fiscal plan is credible, MUFG Bank said, adding that plans to add to borrowing capaci...

item.title: Standard Chartered lifts income guidance again after beating third-quarter profit forecasts
item.description: The lender, which derives most of its revenue from Asia, saw pre-tax profit jump of 37% from the $1.32 billion posted a year ago.

item.title: Alphabet Stock Rallies Premarket After Google Parent Posts Strong Earnings
item.description: S&P 500 and Nasdaq-100 futures edged higher with Alphabet stock rallying premarket after Google’s parent company reported better-than-expected results...
